attributes.action: make everyones name follow with myster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we beleive it would make life a lot easier if everybodies name follwed with "myster"

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
